actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to prohibit Federal matching of State expenditure for aid or assistance under the AFDC or medicaid program (or under any of the other Federal-State public assistance programs) to aliens illegally in the United States.

summary.text: Prohibits Federal matching of State expenditures for aid or assistance under the aid for dependent children or medicaid program of the Social Security Act (or under any of the other Federal-State public assistance programs) to aliens illegally in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to prohibit Federal matching of State expenditure for aid or assistance under the AFDC or medicaid program (or under any of the other Federal-State public assistance programs) to aliens illegally in the United States.
